doc:
Pat Carroll (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pat_Carroll_(actress) 0 Patricia Ann Carroll (born May 5, 1927) is an American actress. She is known for voicing Ursula in The Little Mermaid as well as having a long acting career, including appearances in CBS's The Danny Thomas Show, ABC's Laverne Shirley, NBC's ER, other guest-starring and series-regular roles on American television as well as voice-acting in several cartoon series. Carroll is an Emmy, Drama Desk and Grammy Award winner and a Tony Award nominee. Patricia_Ann_Carroll ( born May_5_,_1927 ) is an_American_actress . She is_known for voicing_Ursula in The_Little_Mermaid as_well as having a_long_acting_career , including appearances in CBS 's_The_Danny_Thomas_Show , ABC 's_Laverne_ , NBC 's_ER , other_guest-starring and series-regular_roles on American_television as_well as voice-acting in several_cartoon_series . Carroll is an_Emmy , Drama_Desk_and_Grammy_Award_winner and a_Tony_Award_nominee .
